text: Les Comes stadium Club de Futbol Igualada is a Spanish football team based in Igualada, in the autonomous community of Catalonia. Founded in 1939, it plays in Primera Catalana, holding home matches at Estadi Les Comes, with a capacity of 4,500 seats. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |-
